https://tmrev.io/movie/885561-Crossing Kalandia 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5kY5gKYqfxyBrkcoqDLfXVe648q.jpg Filmmaker Sobhi al-Zobaidi lives in Ramallah with his wife and baby daughter. ‘Kalandia’ is the checkpoint the family has to cross, whenever they want to get to Jerusalem. The film shows the humiliation Palestinians suffer there every single day. Crossing Kalandia
